song.title: Donald Where's Your Troosers
song.chorus: Let The Wind Blow High Let The Wind Blow Low Through The Streets In M'kilt I'll Go All The Lassies Shout "Hello!" "Donald Where's Your Troosers?"
song.verse: Well I've Just Come Down From The Isle Of Skye I'm Not Very Big And I'm Awfully Shy The Lassies Shout As I Go By "Donald Where's Your Troosers"
A Lassie Took Me To A Ball And It Was Slippery In The Hall I Was Afraid That I Might Fall Twas'nae wearin' Troosers
To Wear The Kilt Is My Delight I'm Never Wrong 'Cause I'm Always Right The Highlanders Would Get A Fright If They Saw My Wearing Troosers!
Well I Was Driving In My Car Went Downtown To Kenny's Bar 15 Scotches, Five Cigars And I Left Without Me Troosers
